body:
Hey 
My brother (EvanAlmaguer621) and I have had some problems.
When we get 2 diamond swords with sharp 1 and put it in the anvil, it gives us an output but when we put it in our inventory and press Esc, the 2 diamond swords fall on the ground and it shows we lost our 2 levels that it costed us. then a couple seconds later the levels come back and we try it again. Same thing happens and we just give up. I don't know if this is a problem or what but it needs to be fixed.
Thanks

title: Problem on Blue Cove?

replies.body: Its when you use 1.8 on a 1.7 comparable server. Because 1.7 anvils and enchanting use more exp but 1.8 uses less, when you use 1.8 it shows up as, say 7 levels, but you really need 17.
